[contact us]
Q group: 603154800
Phone: 400-888-3337
Email: kefu@pwrd.com

iHuman English World keeps growing and improving!
New people have moved in — real-life teachers! Come inside and share in their crazy and funny English learning adventures.
There’s more! Explore the Learning Path and you’ll discover two new units of awesome speaking and listening games. There are also 10 new songs to learn and sing!
It’s not just new things, the helpers in English World been making things better…
- When you speak, we understand your voice better, so keep talking and practicing.
- Praise and encouragement is richer and more rewarding — because you deserve it!
- They didn’t forget about the adults. Registration and log in is now smooth as silk, so kids can jump right into the fun!
--------------------------------------------
[contact us]
Q group: 603154800
Phone: 400-888-3337
Email: kefu@pwrd.com

iHuman English World keeps growing and improving!
New people have moved in — real-life teachers! Come inside and share in their crazy and funny English learning adventures.
There’s more! Explore the Learning Path and you’ll discover two new units of awesome speaking and listening games. There are also 10 new songs to learn and sing!
It’s not just new things, the helpers in English World been making things better…

- Praise and encouragement is richer and more rewarding — because you deserve it!
- They didn’t forget about the adults. Registration and log in is now smooth as silk, so kids can jump right into the fun!

The Children's Day update is here!
English World's real-life teachers are at the Theme Park! Join them for a special Children's Day activity.
Rainbow Rabbit is coming to English World — in AR! She is waiting to speak English with you and give out some awesome prizes.
There's more, the helpers in English World continue making things better!
- Special Children's Day Clown Outfit is now available in the Closet.
- My Bag is where you can now find your Books, Words, and Songs.

--------------------------------------------
[contact us]
Q group: 603154800
Phone: 400-888-3337
Email: kefu@pwrd.com

The helpers in English World have made some updates.
- Discover three new units of exciting speaking and listening games.
- Watch three new videos with our real-life teacher — Mark!
- Read the latest books in William and Ruben’s amazing adventure series.
- Visit your Home and experience the new seasonal environment.
- Minor tweaks to make the login process run smoother.

- Read the next two books in William and Ruben’s amazing adventure series.
- Real-life teacher Mark is ready to introduce English World to you.
- Visit Dialogue City for new help and support speaking English.
